Details
Highlight the freshness of prepared vegetable, fruit, or sandwich platters in your deli or market with the WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate round 18" clear dome lid!
Made of PET plastic, the Checkmate 18" dome lid also provides a sturdy, stackable surface for your catering trays, making transport to your next catered event simple.
Dual "press-n-lift" tabs allow you to easily attach and remove the lid without damaging the tray. The Checkmate clear dome lid has a height of 2 3/4". Sold 25 per case. See Companion Items for compatible catering trays.
Buy 3 or more: $29.06 /CS Buy 2 or less: $30.99 /CS

Customer Reviews for WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18 inch Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS
Overall User Rating: ( 4.8 stars from 5 reviews)
Rating By Allyson S. Posted on 03/30/12
These lids are an excellent product. They allow the customers to see the food before they open it, and also hold in heat from the food. They securely click into their companion tray which makes them excellent for transporting. I highly recommend all this company's tray/lid products!!
WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18" Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS
Rating By Nancy M. Posted on 01/25/12
I like the fact that this cover has two tabs to lock it onto the tray. It was also easy to take off the tray without damaging the cover. I wish the cover was an inch taller.
WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18" Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS User Photos Tray and cover
Rating By Michael R. Posted on 03/08/11
These dome lids go great with the checkmate catering trays. They're tall enough that you can really pile product on the tray without worrying. The client was very impressed.
WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18" Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS
Rating By Lisa C. From Calliope's Po-Boy Posted on 11/11/10
I used to order my trays from the local companies and they often broke on me. Yours is Awesome stuff and the price is great!
WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18" Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS
Rating By Anna R. Posted on 06/07/10
This Comet Clear Dome Lid was ordered to accompany the Comet 18" platter. Product arrived neatly packaged and fit the platter perfectly. The lid was easier to use than other products I have tried.
WNA Comet A18PETDM Checkmate 18" Clear Dome Lid for Round Catering Trays 25/CS
